SEARCH
Package schedule

Class Schedule

java.lang.Object
schedule.Schedule
public class Schedule extends Object
The Schedule class represents the schedule of a doctor for a specific date. It contains the doctor's ID, the date of the schedule, and a list of available time slots. This class provides methods for adding, removing, and displaying time slots, as well as converting the schedule to a CSV-compatible format.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Schedule()
    Default constructor that initializes the schedule with an empty doctor ID, the current date, and an empty list of time slots.
    Schedule(String doctorID, LocalDate date, List<LocalTime> timeSlots)
    Constructor that initializes the schedule with the provided doctor ID, date, and time slots.

  • Constructor Details

    • Schedule

      public Schedule()
      Default constructor that initializes the schedule with an empty doctor ID, the current date, and an empty list of time slots.

    • Schedule

      public Schedule(String doctorID, LocalDate date, List<LocalTime> timeSlots)
      Constructor that initializes the schedule with the provided doctor ID, date, and time slots.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor for whom the schedule is created
      date - The date of the schedule
      timeSlots - A list of available time slots for the doctor on the given date

      The list of available time slots

      Sets the list of time slots for this schedule.
      Parameters:
      timeSlots - The list of time slots to set

    • getScheduleDetails

      public String getScheduleDetails()
      Returns a string representation of the schedule details, including the doctor's ID, the date of the schedule, and the available time slots.
      Returns:
      The schedule details in a readable format

    • toCSVRow

      public String toCSVRow()
      Converts the schedule to a CSV-compatible row format. The time slots are joined with semicolons, and the date is formatted as a string.
      Returns:
      The schedule in CSV row format

    • addTimeSlot

      public void addTimeSlot(LocalTime timeSlot)
      Adds a time slot to the schedule. The time slots are automatically sorted after adding a new time slot.
      Parameters:
      timeSlot - The time slot to add

    • removeTimeSlot

      public void removeTimeSlot(LocalTime timeSlot)
      Removes a time slot from the schedule.
      Parameters:
      timeSlot - The time slot to remove
